title: Women’s Long Sleeve Hooded Crop Tops Letter Print Pullover Sweatshirt
features: Regular fit, light weight, soft and comfortable. For Women and Juniors.

Edge hem made very carefully. Hood is made of two layers of fabric.
Suitable for daily work, traveling, sports, street, party, casual, dating etc.
Good choice to match with high waist leggings or jeans
